1: %%%===================================================================
    2: %%% @copyright (C) 2015, Erlang Solutions Ltd.
    3: %%% @doc Suite for testing pubsub features as described in XEP-0060
    4: %%% @end
    5: %%%===================================================================
    6: 
    7: -module(pubsub_SUITE).
    8: -compile(export_all).
    9: 
   10: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   11: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   12: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   13: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   14: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   15: 
   16: 
   17: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   18: %% Suite configuration
   19: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   20: 
   21: all() -> [
   22:           {group, pubsub_tests},
   23:           {group, node_config_tests},
   24:           {group, manage_subscriptions_tests},
   25:           {group, collection_tests},
   26:           {group, collection_config_tests}
   27:          ].
   28: 
   29: groups() -> [{pubsub_tests, [sequence],
   30:               [
   31:                create_delete_node_test,
   32:                discover_nodes_test,
   33:                subscribe_unsubscribe_test,
   34:                publish_test,
   35:                notify_test,
   36:                request_all_items_test,
   37:                purge_all_items_test,
   38:                retrieve_subscriptions_test
   39:               ]
   40:              },
   41:              {node_config_tests, [sequence],
   42:               [
   43:                disable_notifications_test,
   44:                disable_payload_test,
   45:                disable_persist_items_test,
   46:                notify_only_available_users_test,
   47:                send_last_published_item_test
   48:               ]
   49:              },
   50:              {manage_subscriptions_tests, [sequence],
   51:               [
   52:                retrieve_node_subscriptions_test,
   53:                modify_node_subscriptions_test
   54:               ]
   55:              },
   56:              {collection_tests, [sequence],
   57:               [
   58:                create_delete_collection_test,
   59:                subscribe_unsubscribe_collection_test,
   60:                create_delete_leaf_test,
   61:                notify_collection_test,
   62:                notify_collection_leaf_and_item_test,
   63:                notify_collection_bare_jid_test,
   64:                notify_collection_and_leaf_test,
   65:                notify_collection_and_leaf_same_user_test,
   66:                retrieve_subscriptions_collection_test,
   67:                discover_top_level_nodes_test,
   68:                discover_child_nodes_test,
   69:                request_all_items_leaf_test
   70:               ]
   71:              },
   72:              {collection_config_tests, [sequence],
   73:               [
   74:                disable_notifications_leaf_test,
   75:                disable_payload_leaf_test,
   76:                disable_persist_items_leaf_test
   77:               ]
   78:              }
   79:             ].
   80: 
   81: suite() ->
   82:     escalus:suite().
   83: 
   84: -define(NODE_ADDR, <<"pubsub.localhost">>).
   85: -define(NODE_NAME, <<"princely_musings">>).
   86: -define(NODE, {?NODE_ADDR, ?NODE_NAME}).
   87: 
   88: -define(NODE_NAME_2, <<"subpub">>).
   89: -define(NODE_2, {?NODE_ADDR, ?NODE_NAME_2}).
   90: 
   91: -define(DOMAIN, <<"localhost">>).
   92: 
   93: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   94: %% Init & teardown
   95: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   96: 
   97: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   98:     escalus:init_per_suite(dynamic_modules:save_modules(?DOMAIN, Config)).
   99: 
  100: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  101:     dynamic_modules:restore_modules(?DOMAIN, Config),
  102:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
  103: 
  104: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  105:     dynamic_modules:ensure_modules(?DOMAIN, required_modules()),
  106:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob, geralt])),
  107:     ok.
  108: 
  109: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  110:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob, geralt])),
  111:     ok.
  112: 
  113: init_per_testcase(_TestName, Config) ->
  114:     escalus:init_per_testcase(_TestName, Config).
  115: 
  116: end_per_testcase(_TestName, Config) ->
  117:     escalus:end_per_testcase(_TestName, Config).
  118: 
  119: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  120: %% Test cases for XEP-0060
  121: %% Comments in test cases refer to sections is the XEP
  122: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  123: 
  124: create_delete_node_test(Config) ->
  125:     escalus:story(
  126:       Config,
  127:       [{alice, 1}],
  128:       fun(Alice) ->
  129:               %% Request:  8.1.2 Ex.132 create node with (default) open access model
  130:               %% Response:       Ex.134 success
  131:               %%                        Note: contains node ID although XEP does not require this
  132:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  133: 
  134:               %% Request:  8.4.1 Ex.155 owner deletes a node
  135:               %% Response:       Ex.157 success
  136:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  137:       end).
  138: 
  139: discover_nodes_test(Config) ->
  140:     escalus:story(
  141:       Config,
  142:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  143:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  144:               %% Request:  5.2 Ex.9  Entity asks service for all first-level nodes
  145:               %% Response:     Ex.10 Service returns all first-level nodes (empty yet)
  146:               pubsub_tools:discover_nodes(Bob, ?NODE_ADDR, []),
  147: 
  148:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  149:               pubsub_tools:discover_nodes(Bob, ?NODE_ADDR, [?NODE_NAME]),
  150: 
  151:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE_2, []),
  152:               pubsub_tools:discover_nodes(Bob, ?NODE_ADDR, [?NODE_NAME, ?NODE_NAME_2]),
  153: 
  154:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  155:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE_2, [])
  156:       end).
  157: 
  158: subscribe_unsubscribe_test(Config) ->
  159:     escalus:story(
  160:       Config,
  161:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  162:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  163:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  164: 
  165:               %% Request:  6.1.1 Ex.32 entity subscribes to a node
  166:               %% Response: 6.1.2 Ex.33 success (with subscription ID)
  167:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  168: 
  169:               %% Request:  6.2.1 Ex.51 unsubscribe from a node
  170:               %% Response: 6.2.2 Ex.52 success
  171:               pubsub_tools:unsubscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  172: 
  173:               %% Check subscriptions without resources
  174:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  175:               pubsub_tools:unsubscribe(Bob, ?NODE, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  176: 
  177:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  178:       end).
  179: 
  180: publish_test(Config) ->
  181:     escalus:story(
  182:       Config,
  183:       [{alice,1}],
  184:       fun(Alice) ->
  185:               %% Auto-create enabled by default
  186: 
  187:               %% Request:  7.1.1 Ex.99  publish an item with an ItemID
  188:               %% Response: 7.1.2 Ex.100 success
  189:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  190: 
  191:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  192:       end).
  193: 
  194: notify_test(Config) ->
  195:     escalus:story(
  196:       Config,
  197:       [{alice,1}, {bob,2}, {geralt,2}],
  198:       fun(Alice, Bob1, Bob2, Geralt1, Geralt2) ->
  199:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  200:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob1, ?NODE, []),
  201:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Geralt1, ?NODE, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  202:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  203: 
  204:               %% 7.1.2.1 Ex.101 notification with payload
  205:               %%                Note: message has type 'headline' by default
  206: 
  207:               %% Bob subscribed with resource
  208:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Bob1, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  209:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob2),
  210: 
  211:               %% Geralt subscribed without resource
  212:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Geralt1, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  213:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Geralt2, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  214: 
  215:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  216:       end).
  217: 
  218: request_all_items_test(Config) ->
  219:     escalus:story(
  220:       Config,
  221:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  222:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  223:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  224:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  225:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, ?NODE, []),
  226: 
  227:               %% Request:  6.5.2 Ex.78 subscriber requests all items
  228:               %% Response: 6.5.3 Ex.79 service returns all items
  229:               pubsub_tools:request_all_items(Bob, [<<"item2">>, <<"item1">>], ?NODE),
  230:               %% TODO check ordering (although XEP does not specify this)
  231: 
  232:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  233:       end).
  234: 
  235: purge_all_items_test(Config) ->
  236:     escalus:story(
  237:       Config,
  238:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  239:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  240:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  241:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  242:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, ?NODE, []),
  243: 
  244:               %% Response: 8.5.3.2 Ex.165 insufficient privileges
  245:               pubsub_tools:fail_to_purge_all_items(Bob, <<"auth">>, ?NODE),
  246: 
  247:               pubsub_tools:request_all_items(Bob, [<<"item2">>, <<"item1">>], ?NODE),
  248: 
  249:               %% Request:  8.5.1 Ex.161 owner purges all items from node
  250:               %% Response: 8.5.2 Ex.162 success
  251:               pubsub_tools:purge_all_items(Alice, ?NODE),
  252: 
  253:               pubsub_tools:request_all_items(Bob, [], ?NODE),
  254: 
  255:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  256:       end).
  257: 
  258: retrieve_subscriptions_test(Config) ->
  259:     escalus:story(
  260:       Config,
  261:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  262:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  263:               %% Request:  5.6 Ex.20 Retrieve Subscriptions
  264:               %% Response:     Ex.22 No Subscriptions
  265:               pubsub_tools:retrieve_user_subscriptions(Bob, [], ?NODE_ADDR),
  266: 
  267:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  268:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  269: 
  270:               %% Ex. 21 Service returns subscriptions
  271:               pubsub_tools:retrieve_user_subscriptions(Bob, [{?NODE_NAME, <<"subscribed">>}], ?NODE_ADDR),
  272: 
  273:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE_2, []),
  274:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE_2, []),
  275: 
  276:               %% Ex. 21 Service returns subscriptions
  277:               pubsub_tools:retrieve_user_subscriptions(Bob, [{?NODE_NAME, <<"subscribed">>},
  278:                                                              {?NODE_NAME_2, <<"subscribed">>}], ?NODE_ADDR),
  279: 
  280:               %% Owner not subscribed automatically
  281:               pubsub_tools:retrieve_user_subscriptions(Alice, [], ?NODE_ADDR),
  282: 
  283:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  284:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE_2, [])
  285:       end).
  286: 
  287: disable_notifications_test(Config) ->
  288:     escalus:story(
  289:       Config,
  290:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  291:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  292:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#deliver_notifications">>, <<"false">>}],
  293:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  294: 
  295:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  296:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  297: 
  298:               %% Notifications disabled
  299:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  300: 
  301:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  302:       end).
  303: 
  304: disable_payload_test(Config) ->
  305:     escalus:story(
  306:       Config,
  307:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  308:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  309:               %% Notification-Only Persistent Node, see 4.3, table 4
  310:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#deliver_payloads">>, <<"false">>}],
  311:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  312: 
  313:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  314:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  315: 
  316:               %% Payloads disabled
  317:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, [{with_payload, false}]),
  318: 
  319:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  320:       end).
  321: 
  322: disable_persist_items_test(Config) ->
  323:     escalus:story(
  324:       Config,
  325:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  326:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  327:               %% Payload-Included Transient Node, see 4.3, table 4
  328:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#persist_items">>, <<"false">>}],
  329:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  330: 
  331:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  332:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  333: 
  334:               %% Notifications should work
  335:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  336: 
  337:               %% No items should be stored
  338:               pubsub_tools:request_all_items(Bob, [], ?NODE),
  339: 
  340:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  341:       end).
  342: 
  343: notify_only_available_users_test(Config) ->
  344:     escalus:story(
  345:       Config,
  346:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  347:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  348:               %% Second node notifies only available users
  349:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  350:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#presence_based_delivery">>, <<"true">>}],
  351:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE_2, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  352: 
  353:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  354:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE_2, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  355: 
  356:               escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"unavailable">>)),
  357: 
  358:               %% Receive item from node 1 (also make sure the presence is processed)
  359:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  360:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  361: 
  362:               %% Item from node 2 not received (blocked by resource-based delivery)
  363:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, ?NODE_2, []),
  364:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  365: 
  366:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  367:       end).
  368: 
  369: send_last_published_item_test(Config) ->
  370:     escalus:story(
  371:       Config,
  372:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  373:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  374:               %% Request:  8.1.3 Ex.136 Request a new node with non-default configuration
  375:               %% Response:       Ex.137 Service replies with success
  376:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#send_last_published_item">>, <<"on_sub_and_presence">>}],
  377:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  378: 
  379:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  380:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, ?NODE, []),
  381: 
  382:               %% Note: when Bob subscribes, the last item (item2) is sent to him
  383:               %%       6.1.7 Ex.50 service sends last published item
  384:               %%       This is sent BEFORE the response iq stanza
  385:               pubsub_tools:subscribe_with_notification(Bob, ?NODE, <<"item2">>, []),
  386: 
  387:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  388:       end).
  389: 
  390: retrieve_node_subscriptions_test(Config) ->
  391:     escalus:story(
  392:       Config,
  393:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}, {geralt,1}],
  394:       fun(Alice, Bob, Geralt) ->
  395:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  396: 
  397:               %% Request:  8.8.1.1 Ex.182 Owner requests all subscriptions
  398:               %% Response: 8.8.1.2 Ex.183 Service returns list of subscriptions (empty yet)
  399:               pubsub_tools:retrieve_node_subscriptions(Alice, [], ?NODE),
  400: 
  401:               %% Response: 8.8.1.3 Ex.185 Entity is not an owner
  402:               pubsub_tools:fail_to_retrieve_node_subscriptions(Bob, <<"auth">>, ?NODE),
  403: 
  404:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  405:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Geralt, ?NODE, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  406: 
  407:               pubsub_tools:retrieve_node_subscriptions(Alice, [{Bob, full, <<"subscribed">>},
  408:                                                                {Geralt, bare, <<"subscribed">>}], ?NODE),
  409: 
  410:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  411:       end).
  412: 
  413: modify_node_subscriptions_test(Config) ->
  414:     escalus:story(
  415:       Config,
  416:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}, {geralt,1}],
  417:       fun(Alice, Bob, Geralt) ->
  418:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  419: 
  420:               %% Request:  8.8.2.1 Ex.187 Owner modifies subscriptions
  421:               %% Response: 8.8.2.2 Ex.183 Service responds with success
  422:               pubsub_tools:modify_node_subscriptions(Alice, [{Bob, full, <<"subscribed">>},
  423:                                                              {Geralt, bare, <<"subscribed">>}], ?NODE),
  424: 
  425:               %% 8.8.4 Ex.194 Notify subscribers
  426:               pubsub_tools:receive_subscription_notification(Bob, full, <<"subscribed">>, ?NODE),
  427:               pubsub_tools:receive_subscription_notification(Geralt, bare, <<"subscribed">>, ?NODE),
  428: 
  429:               pubsub_tools:retrieve_node_subscriptions(Alice, [{Bob, full, <<"subscribed">>},
  430:                                                                {Geralt, bare, <<"subscribed">>}], ?NODE),
  431: 
  432:               %% Response: 8.8.2.3 Ex.190 Entity is not an owner
  433:               pubsub_tools:fail_to_modify_node_subscriptions(Bob, [{Geralt, full, <<"subscribed">>}],
  434:                                                              <<"auth">>, ?NODE),
  435: 
  436:               %% Remove Bob, add Geralt's full JID
  437:               pubsub_tools:modify_node_subscriptions(Alice, [{Bob, full, <<"none">>},
  438:                                                              {Geralt, full, <<"subscribed">>}], ?NODE),
  439: 
  440:               pubsub_tools:receive_subscription_notification(Bob, full, <<"none">>, ?NODE),
  441:               pubsub_tools:receive_subscription_notification(Geralt, full, <<"subscribed">>, ?NODE),
  442: 
  443:               pubsub_tools:retrieve_node_subscriptions(Alice, [{Geralt, bare, <<"subscribed">>},
  444:                                                                {Geralt, full, <<"subscribed">>}], ?NODE),
  445: 
  446:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  447:       end).
  448: 
  449: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  450: %% Test cases for XEP-0248
  451: %% Comments in test cases refer to sections is the XEP
  452: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  453: 
  454: -define(LEAF_NAME, <<"leaf">>).
  455: -define(LEAF, {?NODE_ADDR, ?LEAF_NAME}).
  456: 
  457: -define(LEAF_NAME_2, <<"leaf2">>).
  458: -define(LEAF_2, {?NODE_ADDR, ?LEAF_NAME_2}).
  459: 
  460: create_delete_collection_test(Config) ->
  461:     escalus:story(
  462:       Config,
  463:       [{alice,1}],
  464:       fun(Alice) ->
  465:               %% Request:  7.1.1 Ex.18 create collection node
  466:               %% Response:       Ex.19 success
  467:               %%                        Note: contains node ID although XEP does not require this
  468:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  469:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  470: 
  471:               %% Request:  7.3.1 Ex.30 delete collection node
  472:               %% Response: 7.3.2 Ex.31 success
  473:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  474:       end).
  475: 
  476: subscribe_unsubscribe_collection_test(Config) ->
  477:     escalus:story(
  478:       Config,
  479:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  480:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  481:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  482:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  483: 
  484:               %% Request:  6.1.1 Ex.10 subscribe (no configuration)
  485:               %% Response: 6.1.2 Ex.12 success
  486:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  487: 
  488:               %% Same as XEP-0060
  489:               pubsub_tools:unsubscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  490: 
  491:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  492:       end).
  493: 
  494: create_delete_leaf_test(Config) ->
  495:     escalus:story(
  496:       Config,
  497:       [{alice,1}],
  498:       fun(Alice) ->
  499:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  500:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  501: 
  502:               %% XEP-0060, 8.1.2, see 16.4.4 for config details
  503:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  504:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  505: 
  506:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  507:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  508:       end).
  509: 
  510: notify_collection_test(Config) ->
  511:     escalus:story(
  512:       Config,
  513:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  514:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  515:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  516:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  517: 
  518:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  519:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  520:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  521:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  522: 
  523:               %% Publish to leaf nodes, Bob should get notifications
  524:               %% 5.3.1.1 Ex.5 Subscriber receives a publish notification from a collection
  525:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  526:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  527:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, ?LEAF_2, []),
  528:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item2">>, ?LEAF_2, []),
  529: 
  530:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  531:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, []),
  532:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  533:       end).
  534: 
  535: notify_collection_leaf_and_item_test(Config) ->
  536:     escalus:story(
  537:       Config,
  538:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  539:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  540:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  541:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  542: 
  543:               %% Subscribe before creating the leaf node
  544:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  545:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  546:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  547: 
  548:               %% Bob should get a notification for the leaf node creation
  549:               %% 5.3.1.2 Ex.6 Subscriber receives a creation notification from a collection
  550:               pubsub_tools:receive_node_creation_notification(Bob, ?LEAF),
  551: 
  552:               %% Publish to leaf node, Bob should get notified
  553:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  554:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  555: 
  556:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  557:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  558:       end).
  559: 
  560: notify_collection_bare_jid_test(Config) ->
  561:     escalus:story(
  562:       Config,
  563:       [{alice,1}, {bob,2}, {geralt,2}],
  564:       fun(Alice, Bob1, Bob2, Geralt1, Geralt2) ->
  565:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  566:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  567: 
  568:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  569:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  570:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob1, ?NODE, []),
  571:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Geralt1, ?NODE, [{jid_type, bare}]),
  572:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  573: 
  574:               %% Bob subscribed with resource
  575:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Bob1, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  576:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob2),
  577: 
  578:               %% Geralt subscribed without resource
  579:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Geralt1, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  580:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Geralt2, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  581: 
  582:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  583:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  584:       end).
  585: 
  586: notify_collection_and_leaf_test(Config) ->
  587:     escalus:story(
  588:       Config,
  589:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}, {geralt,1}],
  590:       fun(Alice, Bob, Geralt) ->
  591:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  592:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  593: 
  594:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  595:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  596:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  597:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Geralt, ?LEAF, []),
  598: 
  599:               %% Publish to leaf nodes, Bob and Geralt should get notifications
  600:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  601:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  602:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Geralt, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  603: 
  604:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  605:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  606:       end).
  607: 
  608: notify_collection_and_leaf_same_user_test(Config) ->
  609:     escalus:story(
  610:       Config,
  611:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  612:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  613:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  614:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  615: 
  616:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  617:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  618:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  619:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?LEAF, []),
  620: 
  621:               %% Bob should get only one notification
  622:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  623:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  624:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  625: 
  626:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  627:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  628:       end).
  629: 
  630: retrieve_subscriptions_collection_test(Config) ->
  631:     escalus:story(
  632:       Config,
  633:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  634:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  635:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  636:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  637: 
  638:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  639:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  640:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  641:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  642:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?LEAF, []),
  643: 
  644:               % Only the nodes for which subscriptions were made should be returned
  645:               pubsub_tools:retrieve_user_subscriptions(Bob, [{?LEAF_NAME, <<"subscribed">>},
  646:                                                              {?NODE_NAME, <<"subscribed">>}], ?NODE_ADDR),
  647: 
  648:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  649:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, []),
  650:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  651:       end).
  652: 
  653: discover_top_level_nodes_test(Config) ->
  654:     escalus:story(
  655:       Config,
  656:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  657:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  658:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  659:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  660: 
  661:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  662:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  663: 
  664:               %% Discover top-level nodes, only the collection expected
  665:               pubsub_tools:discover_nodes(Bob, ?NODE_ADDR, [?NODE_NAME]),
  666: 
  667:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  668:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  669:       end).
  670: 
  671: discover_child_nodes_test(Config) ->
  672:     escalus:story(
  673:       Config,
  674:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  675:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  676:               %% Try to get children of a non-existing node
  677:               pubsub_tools:fail_to_discover_nodes(Bob, ?NODE, <<"cancel">>),
  678: 
  679:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  680:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  681: 
  682:               pubsub_tools:discover_nodes(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  683: 
  684:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  685:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  686:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  687: 
  688:               %% Request:  5.2.1 Ex.11 Entity requests child nodes
  689:               %% Response: 5.2.2 Ex.12 Service returns child nodes
  690:               pubsub_tools:discover_nodes(Bob, ?NODE, [?LEAF_NAME, ?LEAF_NAME_2]),
  691: 
  692:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  693:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, []),
  694:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  695:       end).
  696: 
  697: request_all_items_leaf_test(Config) ->
  698:     escalus:story(
  699:       Config,
  700:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  701:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  702:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  703:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  704: 
  705:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  706:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  707:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  708: 
  709:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  710:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, ?LEAF_2, []),
  711: 
  712:               %% Request items from leaf nodes - as described in XEP-0060
  713:               pubsub_tools:request_all_items(Bob, [<<"item1">>], ?LEAF),
  714:               pubsub_tools:request_all_items(Bob, [<<"item2">>], ?LEAF_2),
  715: 
  716:               %% NOTE: This is not implemented yet
  717:               %% Request:  6.2.1 Ex.15 Subscriber requests all items on a collection
  718:               %% Response: 6.2.2 Ex.16 Service returns items on leaf nodes
  719:               %%pubsub_tools:request_all_items(Bob, [<<"item2">>, <<"item1">>], ?NODE),
  720: 
  721:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  722:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF_2, []),
  723:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  724:       end).
  725: 
  726: disable_notifications_leaf_test(Config) ->
  727:     escalus:story(
  728:       Config,
  729:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  730:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  731:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  732:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  733: 
  734:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#deliver_notifications">>, <<"false">>},
  735:                             {<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  736:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  737: 
  738:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  739:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  740: 
  741:               %% Notifications disabled
  742:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  743: 
  744:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  745:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  746:       end).
  747: 
  748: disable_payload_leaf_test(Config) ->
  749:     escalus:story(
  750:       Config,
  751:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  752:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  753:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  754:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  755: 
  756:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#deliver_payloads">>, <<"false">>},
  757:                             {<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  758:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  759: 
  760:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  761:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  762: 
  763:               %% Payloads disabled
  764:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, [{with_payload, false}]),
  765: 
  766:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  767:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  768:       end).
  769: 
  770: disable_persist_items_leaf_test(Config) ->
  771:     escalus:story(
  772:       Config,
  773:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  774:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  775:               CollectionConfig = [{<<"pubsub#node_type">>, <<"collection">>}],
  776:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, CollectionConfig}]),
  777: 
  778:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#persist_items">>, <<"false">>},
  779:                             {<<"pubsub#collection">>, ?NODE_NAME}],
  780:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?LEAF, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  781: 
  782:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  783:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  784: 
  785:               %% Notifications should work
  786:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?LEAF, []),
  787: 
  788:               %% No items should be stored
  789:               pubsub_tools:request_all_items(Bob, [], ?LEAF),
  790: 
  791:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?LEAF, []),
  792:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  793:       end).
  794: 
  795: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  796: %% Tests for features unsupported by ejabberd
  797: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  798: 
  799: disable_payload_and_persist_test(Config) ->
  800:     escalus:story(
  801:       Config,
  802:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  803:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  804:               %% Notification-Only Transient Node, see 4.3, table 4
  805:               NodeConfig = [{<<"pubsub#deliver_payloads">>, <<"false">>},
  806:                             {<<"pubsub#persist_items">>, <<"false">>}],
  807:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, [{config, NodeConfig}]),
  808: 
  809:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, []),
  810: 
  811:               %% Response  7.1.3 Ex.112 attempt to publish payload to transient notification node
  812:               %%                   Expected error of type 'modify'
  813:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, [{expected_error_type, <<"modify">>}]),
  814: 
  815:               %% Publish without payload should succeed
  816:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, ?NODE, [{with_payload, false}]),
  817: 
  818:               %% Notifications should work
  819:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(Bob, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  820: 
  821:               %% No items should be stored
  822:               pubsub_tools:request_all_items(Bob, [], ?NODE),
  823: 
  824:               %% No more notifications
  825:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  826: 
  827:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  828:       end).
  829: 
  830: disable_delivery_test(Config) ->
  831:     escalus:story(
  832:       Config,
  833:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  834:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  835:               pubsub_tools:create_node(Alice, ?NODE, []),
  836: 
  837:               %% Request: 6.3.7 Ex.71 Subscribe and configure
  838:               %%                Ex.72 Success
  839:               SubscrConfig = [{<<"pubsub#deliver">>, <<"false">>}],
  840:               pubsub_tools:subscribe(Bob, ?NODE, [{config, SubscrConfig}]),
  841: 
  842:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, ?NODE, []),
  843: 
  844:               %% Notifications disabled
  845:               escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
  846: 
  847:               pubsub_tools:delete_node(Alice, ?NODE, [])
  848:       end).
  849: 
  850: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  851: %% Helpers
  852: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  853: 
  854: required_modules() ->
  855:     [{mod_pubsub, [
  856:                    {plugins,[<<"dag">>]},
  857:                    {nodetree,<<"dag">>}
  858:                   ]}].
